snippet: The retailers temporarily shut down their online photo processing services to determine the extent of a possible credit card data breach.
abstract: Retailers CVS and Walmart Canada report that credit card data for millions of users may have been compromised by hacking of networks at PNI Digital Media, Vancouver-based information technology vendor.
lead_paragraph: The retailers temporarily shut down their online photo processing services to determine the extent of a possible credit card data breach.

headline.main: CVS and Walmart Canada Are Investigating a Data Breach
headline.print_headline: 2 Retailers Investigate Data Breach in Websites
